DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Use nicotine inhaler and/or bupropion may effective help people stop smoke prevent start smoking . It yet know whether nicotine inhaler bupropion effective alone combine stop smoking . DOC.brief_title: Comparison Nicotine Inhaler and/or Bupropion Helping People Stop Smoking Prevent Recurrence Smoking
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare effectiveness nicotine inhaler v bupropion v nicotine inhaler plus bupropion smoking cessation prevention relapse participant currently smoke . II . Compare reduction rate relapse smoke initial abstinence participant treat long term regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord gender , cigarettes smoked per day time screen ( 10-39 v 40 ) , total length smoking year ( less 5 vs 5-9 v 10 ) . Participants randomize one three treatment arm . Arm I : Participants receive 6-16 nicotine inhaler cartridge per day . Arm II : Participants receive oral bupropion 1-2 time daily . Arm III : Participants receive 6-16 nicotine inhaler cartridge per day oral bupropion 1-2 time daily . In arm , treatment continue 12 week . After 12 week , participant randomize second time base whether continue smoke smoke-free . Participants randomize arm I continue smoke randomize one two treatment arm . Arm IV : Participants receive oral bupropion 1-2 time daily 12 week Arm V : Participants receive oral placebo 1-2 time daily 12 week . Participants randomize arm II continue smoke randomize one two treatment arm . Arm VI : Participants receive 6-16 nicotine inhaler cartridge per day 12 week . Arm VII : Participants receive 6-16 placebo inhaler cartridge per day 12 week . Participants randomize arm III continue smoke receive therapy . Participants randomize arm I smoke-free randomized one two treatment arm . Arm VIII : Participants receive 6-16 nicotine inhaler cartridge per day 40 week . Arm IX : Participants receive 6-16 placebo inhaler cartridge per day 40 week . Participants randomize arm II smoke-free randomize one two treatment arm . Arm X : Participants receive oral bupropion 1-2 time daily 40 week . Arm XI : Participants receive oral placebo 1-2 time daily 40 week . Participants randomize arm III smoke-free randomize one four treatment arm . Arm XII : Participants receive 6-16 nicotine inhaler cartridge per day oral placebo 1-2 time daily 40 week . Arm XIII : Participants receive 6-16 placebo inhaler cartridge per day oral bupropion 1-2 time daily 40 week . Arm XIV : Participants receive 6-16 nicotine inhaler cartridge per day oral bupropion 1-2 time daily 40 week . Arm XV : Participants receive 6-16 placebo inhaler cartridge per day oral placebo 1-2 time daily 40 week . All participant follow every month 6 month .
